page.title: 19Gorleston, Club Members.
page.content: When the golf club was founded by Sir John Drughorn in 1906 there were only a few members then. Now there are 500 members, the majority being men. The price of membership is Â£116 per annum. This gives members the opportunity to play golf any time of the year. Juniors get free tuition from some of the 9 paid staff. The youngest member of the club is 9 & the oldest is 83 years old. The average age of the 82 golfers is 33. Friendlies are organised & through these the club has had 105 play individually or as a team.
